definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="JsonObject" id="jasonconfigobj">jasonconfigobj</variable><variable type="File" id="jasonconfig">jasonconfig</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">mod_load</field><next><block type="variables_set_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:jasonconfig</field><value name="VAL"><block type="file_variable"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:jasonconfig</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">jasonconfig.json</field></block></value><value name="location"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="get_game_directory"></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/config/</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="file_exists"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:jasonconfig</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="create_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:jasonconfig</field><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:jasonconfigobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">jason_spawn_time</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:jasonconfigobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">spawn time can be set from 1 to 5, 1 being the lowest 5 being the highest</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:jasonconfigobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">jason_killed_cooldown</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:jasonconfigobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">the killed cooldown can go from 1 to 5, 1 being the lowest 5 being the highest. The kill cooldown happens when you kill jason</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:jasonconfigobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">the default is 3, which is 3 days in game so 2 would be 2 days etc</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:jasonconfigobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">jason_music</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:jasonconfigobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">the jason music just toggles on and off the music for when jason is chasing/searching for you</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:jasonconfigobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">does_jason_get_faster_at_blood_stage_3</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:jasonconfigobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">does_jason_get_stronger_with_each_blood_stage</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:jasonconfigobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">jasons bloodstage goes up everytime he hits the player 3 times</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:jasonconfigobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">the max bloodstage jason can go to is 3</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:jasonconfigobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">jason_spawn_during_day</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:jasonconfigobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">the spawning during day toggles whether jason can spawn during the day or not</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:jasonconfigobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">ft13th_game_music</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:jasonconfigobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">if ft13th game music is toggled/set to "true" than music from the Friday the 13th game will play instead of the custom music the mod comes with</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="write_json"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="JOBJVAR">local:jasonconfigobj</field><field name="VAR">local:jasonconfig</field></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
